casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Toney M. PARKER, Jr. No. 460P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. Derrick C. Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of October 2008 by Defendant for Petition for a Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of December 2008."
